appropriate start and end points (given via latitude,longitude).

-Info_Fragment is new java fragment for drop info page

title: Get Drop Points from Database
message:
Get Drop Points from Database
- added JSONParser class which calls the webservice which calls the
database and parses the resultant JSON
- added method in MapFragment that does the querying to get results
- added call to the querying method followed by populating the map with
pins for the results in MapFragment's onCreate method

title: Transitions
message:
Transitions

- Fragments transition smoothly between one another

title: Customized ActionBar + Bug Fix
message:
Customized ActionBar + Bug Fix

accordingly
- Moved "Add_Drop" button to action bar as an action button
- Made "Add_Drop" action button invisible to except when on the map
- Fixed bug that caused the app to crash when opening "Contact Us" twice
in a row
